ComicInfo.Title: The Burnt Offering, Part 1: Headless Horsemen
ComicInfo.Summary: A floating city promises hope for humans and mutants alike! But if Cable plans to be Earth's Savior, will Deadpool accept the role of Judas? Marvel Universe guest-stars! Intrigue! Adventure! Big flying fists and loose-lips fun!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:03:34. [CVDB105842]
ComicInfo.Inker: Crystal Reid, Patrick Zircher, Rob Ross
ComicInfo.Characters: Anaconda, Beast, Cable, Cat, Constrictor, Cyclops, Deadpool, Domino, Dum Dum Dugan, Emma Frost, G.W. Bridge, Hammer, Irene Merryweather, Nick Fury, Solo, Weasel, Wolverine
ComicInfo.Locations: Danger Room, Hong Kong, New York City, Tokyo, Xavier Institute
